Reference

All functions

apply(<on_disc_matrix>)

apply apply a function to the rows or columns of an on_disc_matrix.

increment_indices()

Increment indices

index_vec-class

index_vec class A union of the numeric, logical, and character classes. Used for indexing of on_disc_matrices. Idea borrowed from Matrix package.

ondisc

ondisc: A package for out-of-memory computing on single-cell data

print first few rows and columns of an on_disc_matrix to the console; also display object class
